column5: Hit a couple on roe then jigs dominated the rest of the day. White sparkle jigs (Daiichi hook) was just one colour that was producing well. Have a safe weekend.
I was slammin on jigs today too, white with red flare and peach with pink flare.  Looks good man, nice fish!
pink & purple were my magic today  jig, i mean! p.-
nice fish man, like the pic too...
Excellent shot, 'streak. Depth of field, and the light on the pink are amazing.  Do tie those jigs yourself?
